TextView.android:text: Welcome to the Proxcloud Firmware Loader app

This app makes flashing new firmware to the Proxmark3 as simple as possible. Just plug the proxmark3 in to your Android device and click 'Connect', permission to access the device will be requested, once permission is granted, simply click 'Start Flash' to begin writing the new firmware. Default options include the Proxcloud service firmware and the offical proxmark3 firwamre, but you can also choose to load your own custom firmware from any file on the system. Flashing the device bootloader is also supported.
